bugprone-throwing-static-initialization.description:
Description

Finds all
static
or
thread_local
variable declarations where the
initializer for the object may throw an exception.

References
This check corresponds to the CERT C++ Coding Standard rule
ERR58-CPP. Handle all exceptions thrown before main() begins executing
.
bugprone-throwing-static-initialization.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
